qas.question: What other famous movie did Cacoyannis direct?
Who starred in the movie Zorba the Greek?
What film won the Palme d'Or at Cannes in 1998?
Who directed the film Eternity and a Day?

context: Cacoyannis also directed <a0_0>Zorba the Greek<a0_0/> with <a1_0>Anthony Quinn<a1_0/> which received Best Director, Best Adapted Screenplay and Best Film nominations. Finos Film also contributed to this period with movies such as Λατέρνα, Φτώχεια και Φιλότιμο, Madalena, Η Θεία από το Σικάγο, Το ξύλο βγήκε από τον Παράδεισο and many more. During the 1970s and 1980s <a3_0>Theo Angelopoulos<a3_0/> directed a series of notable and appreciated movies. His film <a2_0>Eternity and a Day<a2_0/> won the Palme d'Or and the Prize of the Ecumenical Jury at the 1998 Cannes Film Festival.
